Official: Zul Logoth Sorcerer's Guild Opens Workshop!

1
Alastir
Monday, August 7th, 2017, 11:58:04 PM

The Zul Logoth Sorcerer's Guild is proud to announce the opening of their own magical workshop, improving the facilities up to match the magical prowess of other branches of the Guild! This magical confluence will prove invaluable to local members who wish to create magical items or infuse scrolls.

The magical workshop can be found through the roughly carved archway in the tunnels above the alchemy facilities.

Thanks go to GameMaster Aiza for providing the lovely facilities!

ASGM

This message was originally posted in Towns, Zul Logoth. To discuss the above, follow the link below. http://forums.play.net/forums/19/225/2500/view/362
